00028 {
00029     WHITE=0,
00030     BLACK,
00031     RED,
00032     GREEN,
00033     BLUE,
00034     MAGENTA,
00035     CYAN,
00036     VIOLET,
00037     PINK,
00038     ORANGE,

00043     GRAY,

00054     LIGHTGREEN,
00055     LIGHTBLUE,
00056     LIGHTMAGENTA,
00057     LIGHTCYAN,
00058     LIGHTVIOLET,
00059     LIGHTPINK,
00060     LIGHTORANGE,
00061     LIGHTYELLOW,
00062     AUTO,       // automatic choice of colors
00063     AUTOID,     // automatic choice of colors depending on the particle ID
00064     AUTOTYPE,   // automatic choice of colors depending on the particle type 
00065     AUTOITER,   // automatic choice of colors iterating through colors
00066     AUTOENERGY  // continuous color palette indicating hit energies
00067 };
